AfterShow.Name: Start
AfterShow.Source: const escapeName = (name) => `${name}`.trim().replace(/([^a-z0-9\w-:/]+)/gi, '-');		const editor = grapesjs.init({			cssComposer: {},			container: '#gjs',		  	fromElement: true,		  	storageManager: false,		  	selectorManager: { escapeName },		  	plugins: ['grapesjs-tailwind'],			  deviceManager: {				devices: [				{					name: 'Mobile',					width: '375px', // Example width for mobile					height: '667px', // Example height for mobile					widthMedia: '480px', // Media query for mobile view				},				],			},		});
